desc.en:
The Singing skill is a class magic skill. The magic skill determines what spells you can learn from the Singing line of magic.

The following playable classes get the singing skill:

  • Bard

There are generally two categories of magic spells:

  • Combat castable
  • Out of combat castable

Spells in this magic line fall into both categories as it contains a varied range of spells including:

  • Heal spells
  • Nulifiy spells
  • Paralysis spells
  • Damage spells

Singing makes an excellent jack of all trades magic skill for people who wish to do a lot of varied things.

To learn more spells you need to find spell scrolls or visit a Singing magic spell trainer who can teach you more spells.
